Package com.quorum.tessera.enclave

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BinaryEncoder
    Encodes bytes to the binary form expected by other nodes on the network
    Enclave
    An Enclave provides encryption/decryption functions and keeps hold of all the nodes private keys so the do not leak into other services.
    EnclaveClient
    A client which interfaces with a remote Enclave over a defined transport mechanism.
    EnclaveClientFactory<T extends EnclaveClient>
    Creates clients which connect to remote instances of an enclave.
    EnclaveFactory
    Creates Enclave instances, which may point to remote services or local, in-app instances.
    PayloadEncoder
    Encodes and decodes a EncodedPayload to and from its binary representation
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EnclaveImpl  
    EncodedPayload
    This class contains the data that is sent to other nodes
    EncodedPayloadBuilder  
    PayloadEncoderImpl  
    RawTransaction  
    RawTransactionBuilder  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EnclaveException
    A generic exception when an Enclave encounters an error performing the requested operation.
    EnclaveNotAvailableException
    Thrown when the Enclave was requested to perform an operation but was unavailable.
    InvalidRecipientException
    An exception to indicate the recipient is valid for the operation being performed
